item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We are a highly qualified team of talented designers
and developers.

Let's Talk

Our stellar software development services

Web Application Development

Our web application development services make it easier to create, update, and maintain software applications that run on the web. By working with Designveloper, you can speed up the growth of your user base, get access to new digital channels, improve your conversion rate, and reach other business goals faster.

Mobile Application Development

Designveloper designs highly practical, technologically transformational, feature-rich native mobile apps for consumers and enterprises. We'll oversee mobile app development from inception to delivery and maintenance.

UI/UX Design

With Designveloper's business management solutions, you will be able to work smarter and bring about impeccable efficiency. Our services include CRM, tasks, document, project and time management, business process automation, team collaboration, corporate directory, HRMS, just to name a few.

Why choose Designveloper?

Designveloper is here to assist you in accomplishing all of your digital objectives, enhancing your workflows and business preparedness. With our one-of-a-kind, scalable, and secure solution, your firms will win and stand out from the others. Whether you already have a plan or not, our software development services will help you envision and put it into action.

Our Software Development Highlights

  • Our project managers have extensive expertise with large, complicated projects involving dispersed teams and various vendors.
  • We have an abundance of senior talent and a specialized human resources team to assist you at every stage of development.
  • Designveloper employs Agile Scrum as the core methodology for delivering digital goods on time and on budget while emphasizing collaboration and continual improvement.
  • Transparent working process builds trust among employees and partners by making information available for accuracy checks
  • Strict KPIs for business results, software quality, code quality, development process efficiency, project time and expenses (actual vs. budget, etc.), team productivity, and customer/user delight.
  • Designveloper prioritizes keeping up with trends as part of our software development services to help firms maintain their relevance in their respective, competitive industry.

Essential principles of our software development process

We love project management triangle at Designveloper

According to the project management triangle model, which represents the limitations during the project management process, you can only optimize 2 of the 3 determinants: Fast, Good, and Cheap. Designveloper as a software development company focuses on Fast and Good, with rates already lower than that of maintainance of an in-house team or other software development firms in industrialized nations. With a strategy centered on Fast and Good, Designveloper‚Äôs top-notch software development services ensure that you receive the highest quality services at lightning speed without having to worry about the price.

Our clear steps of executing a project, after you signed a contract with us

In addition to offering comprehensive software development services tailored to your industry and budgetary needs, Designveloper adheres to a specific plan of action to ensure the success of the project.

Working with DSV on our major project has been an incredible experience.

‚ÄúWe are now a long-term client with a major team. They achieve to keep good developers and conduct our project perfectly and rapidly. They know how to report and communicate with the client and other client teams.‚Äù

Umer Khan

Co-Founder

News & Events

Update all the latest articles regarding the software development industry, technical knowledge and best practices as well as life at Designveloper, etc. here now!

Why Choose Us

Passionate

Professional

item.title: Services Main Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Software Development
Services

Designveloper‚Äôs team of skilled and driven software developers will create long-term value with our excellent software development services. By using deep technical knowledge and industry-spanning experience, we facilitate strong, full-cycle support from the first market research and business analysis to the idea, production, and release.

Click here

Our stellar software development services

Web Application Development

Our web application development services make it easier to create, update, and maintain software applications that run on the web. By working with Designveloper, you can speed up the growth of your user base, get access to new digital channels, improve your conversion rate, and reach other business goals faster.

Mobile Application Development

Designveloper designs highly practical, technologically transformational, feature-rich native mobile apps for consumers and enterprises. We'll oversee mobile app development from inception to delivery and maintenance.

Business Management Solutions

With Designveloper's business management solutions, you will be able to work smarter and bring about impeccable efficiency. Our services include CRM, tasks, document, project and time management, business process automation, team collaboration, corporate directory, HRMS, just to name a few.

UI/UX Design

With our exceptional UI/UX design services, we help you show off your brand's finest and exceed user expectations. Let‚Äôs collaborate to establish long-term customer retention strategies and real, human-centered brand identities that have a direct impact on today's digital landscape.

Why choose Designveloper?

Designveloper is here to assist you in accomplishing all of your digital objectives, enhancing your workflows and business preparedness. With our one-of-a-kind, scalable, and secure solution, your firms will win and stand out from the others. Whether you already have a plan or not, our software development services will help you envision and put it into action.

Our Software Development Highlights

      • Designveloper employs Agile Scrum as the core methodology for delivering digital goods on time and on budget while emphasizing collaboration and continual improvement.
      • Transparent working process builds trust among employees and partners by making information available for accuracy checks
      • Strict KPIs for business results, software quality, code quality, development process efficiency, project time and expenses (actual vs. budget, etc.), team productivity, and customer/user delight.
      • Designveloper prioritizes keeping up with trends as part of our software development services to help firms maintain their relevance in their respective, competitive industry.
      • Our project managers have extensive expertise with large, complicated projects involving dispersed teams and various vendors.
      • We have an abundance of senior talent and a specialized human resources team to assist you at every stage of development.
    ¬†

Partnerships & Recognitions

Using the deep domain knowledge of our software developers, we can work together to make digital solutions that have a strategic vision and drive meaningful change. We put a lot of value on our partnerships with well-known industry leaders and always strive towards collective growth. Your success is our success!

Working with DSV on our major project has been an incredible experience.

We are now a long-term client with a major team. They achieve to keep good developers and conduct our project perfectly and rapidly. They know how to report and communicate with the client and other client teams Working with their design and developer team has helped us smoothing the communication and reduce the rework as they make workshops together. John DoeCEO I‚Äôve been working with Designveloper for nearly 2 years until now. Friendly team, fast development, quality programmers. Highly recommend them John Doe 1CEO I gave them simple ideas. They analysis my requirements and design ‚Äòscreen flow‚Äô themselves very well. If you wonder what you think, call them üôÇ John Doe2CEO Previous Next

Essential principles of our software development process

We love project management triangle at Designveloper

According to the project management triangle model, which represents the limitations during the project management process, you can only optimize 2 of the 3 determinants: Fast, Good, and Cheap. Designveloper as a software development company focuses on Fast and Good, with rates already lower than that of maintainance of an in-house team or other software development firms in industrialized nations. With a strategy centered on Fast and Good, Designveloper‚Äôs top-notch software development services ensure that you receive the highest quality services at lightning speed without having to worry about the price.

Our clear steps of executing a project, after you signed a contract with us

In addition to offering comprehensive software development services tailored to your industry and budgetary needs, Designveloper adheres to a specific plan of action to ensure the success of the project.

Industries that Designveloper take part in

We work with businesses of varying sizes and operating in a wide variety of sectors to develop inspiring and influential software products. Our customers are completely satisfied with the results of our partnership and efforts on their behalf.

The project management methodology at Designveloper

Our qualified experts in Agile techniques will expedite the development of your project while enhancing its outcomes. Using the Agile process, there will always be streamlined, cost-effective processes tailored to your objectives, schedule, and budget.

Agile methodology is usually used at our company for project management

¬†¬† ¬† Working team of 3-10 members (upon how big project is) including designer, QC/tester, BA...¬†¬†¬† ¬† Use the Agile method - Set and review our target weekly or bi-weekly (weekly report will be sent) - Review our features monthly (which features have been done and which are still missing)¬†¬†¬† ¬† Setup a demo monthly to see which part of the project has been done to make sure the project is on track and confirm customer requirements.

FIRST MEET

Free of Cost
  • Consult meeting
  • Rough estimation
  • Online chatting room support
Get Started

BUSINESS

500$ (will be refunded if sign contract and start)
  • Detail estimation
  • Email supporting
  • Online chatting room support
Get Started Estimate Your Project

Pricing options for our Software Development Services

Listed below are some price options for our software development services. Rest certain that there is a pricing plan that is compatible with your vision and the spirit of your project.

HOURLY

  • Estimate the hourly rate based on your project
  • Bi-weekly or monthly payment base on the report from Hubstaff
  • DSV will report to justify payments
Get Started

MONTHLY

  • More attractive price than hourly rate
  • Pay by month
  • DSV will still report the process and working by week
Get Started NEW

FIXED PRICE

  • You will notice the total price after project estimation
  • Separate into small milestones (each about 2-4 weeks)
  • DSV will invoice upon each milestone.
Get Started

Related Case Studies

Lumin

Lumin is a web app for PDF file storage, editing, and integration.s on both mobile and website app, synchronize PDF files across devices, and share PDF files. It has gained 22 million users till now.

ODC

Gamify the management of businesses using points and rankings

Swell & Switchboard

Switchboard takes the hassle out of going solar, batteries and smart home technology by connecting you to local sales people and reliable installers that will walk you through the process.

Let‚Äôs talk about your project

Your personal information

We are now a long-term client with a major team. They achieve to keep good developers and conduct our project perfectly and rapidly. They know how to report and communicate with the client and other client teams Working with their design and developer team has helped us smoothing the communication and reduce the rework as they make workshops together. We love project management triangle at Designveloper

According to the project management triangle model, which represents the limitations during the project management process, you can only optimize 2 of the 3 determinants: Fast, Good, and Cheap. Designveloper as a software development company focuses on Fast and Good, with rates already lower than that of maintainance of an in-house team or other software development firms in industrialized nations. With a strategy centered on Fast and Good, Designveloper’s top-notch software development services ensure that you receive the highest quality services at lightning speed without having to worry about the price.

The project management methodology at Designveloper

Our qualified experts in Agile techniques will expedite the development of your project while enhancing its outcomes. Using the Agile process, there will always be streamlined, cost-effective processes tailored to your objectives, schedule, and budget.

","align":"center","text_color":"#FFEEEE","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"},{"id":"15ffbbe","elType":"container","settings":{"content_width":"full","flex_direction":"row","pa_condition_repeater":[],"premium_tooltip_text":"Hi, I'm a global tooltip.","premium_tooltip_position":"top,bottom"},"elements":[{"id":"8514cc2","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Agile methodology is usually used at our company for project management

 
    Working team of 3-10 members (upon how big project is) including designer, QC/tester, BA...
 
 
    Use the Agile method - Set and review our target weekly or bi-weekly (weekly report will be sent) - Review our features monthly (which features have been done and which are still missing)
 
 
    Setup a demo monthly to see which part of the project has been done to make sure the project is on track and confirm customer requirements.
